entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: KMAC #93494
    9.0.0
  • [6.0, 7.0] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.Test*WorkingSet* assert failures #93491
  • [Mono] Implement small types atomic intrinsics for CompareExchange and Exchange #93488
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression.SubReadStream Read Makes Unnecessary Calls #93478
  • Delay Windows Service "Running" State Transition in .NET 6 BackgroundService #93476
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives with primitive types other than float #93474
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json Polymorphic Attribute Should Provide an Option to Include Type Discriminators on Derived Types #93471
  • Auto-filling of tracking issues for CI jobs failures on main #93468
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Synthetic/helper methods #93464
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 4) #93462
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 3) #93461
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 2) #93460
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE/SVE2 : Unpredicated instructions (part 1 of 4) #93459
  • Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.amd64.dll version downgraded in 7.0.12 service pack #93458
  • Complex.ToString format changed from (a, b) to <a; b> #93454
  • Trimming: Investigate if we can provide an analyzer which guides people to use `UnconditionalSuppressMessage` #93453
  • Add display name filtering in merged tests #93452
  • [NativeAOT] Enable running libraries and functional tests on CI for maccatalyst and ios/tvos simulators #93447
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M12-Beta2/b71869/b71869/b71869.dll #93444
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b25815/b25815/b25815.dll #93443
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/rtchecks/overflow/overflow02_mul/overflow02_mul.dll #93442
  • Test failure: JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldc_mul_ovf_i4/ldc_mul_ovf_i4.dll #93441
  • KeyedService.AnyKey is not usable with ServiceKeyAttribute due to type validation #93438
  • [NativeAOT] set StaticICULinking results in a CmakeLists.txt that violates policy CMP0000 of Cmake (affects CMake version >= 3.9.0) #93436
  • Marshalling generators LastIndexMarshalled tracking doesn't free partially marshalled inner array elements if marshalling fails #93431
    Future

Closed

  • Options source gen produce diagnostics with LengthAttribute when applied on properties of interface type #93403
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Recognize ORN on ARM64 #93435
    Future
  • superpmi-replay/superpmi-diffs fail with "No space left on device" #93332
  • NativeAOT stripped symbol files aren't loaded automatically in MacOS+lldb #86734
    9.0.0
  • Cascading JsonSourceGenerator Not Working #93439
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' in 'Runtime_92537:Mul #93299
    9.0.0
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose tests fail on Fedora 38 #91543
    Future
  • Question: Native AOT: Is there a way to increase inline limit? #93393
  • JsonException error messages include type information #92776
  • LINQ Groupby has no memory efficient implementation #93237
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicRemoteExecutorTests.SslKeyLogFile_IsCreatedAndFilled fails #93404
  • [API Proposal]: LINQ GroupBy to expose IReadOnlyList instead of IEnumerable #93386
  • [wasm] Resource loader override is ignored by worker in multithreading mode #93133
    9.0.0
  • ArgumentException: maccatalyst does not have a valid platform name #90313
  • Test failure JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldc_mul_ovf_i4/ldc_mul_ovf_i4.dll #93448
  • [API Proposal]: SIMD/Vectorial operations on arrays/Spans #60559
    Future
  • HttpListenerRequest.UserAgent should be attributed as nullable #93033
    Future
  • Flow graph successors representation for BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #84278
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add native support for exhaustive enum-based switch expressions #93434
  • [NETSDKE2E]CoreCLR symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols in VS 17.8 preview 3. #93256
  • Everything works well untill joining server #93433

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2290974 #93496
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide Microsoft.Extentions.FileProviders.Abstractions package readme #93489
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Runtime tests - fix CI build #93486
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide Microsoft.Extentions.FileProviders.Physical package readme #93485
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] start MonoVM during DLL download #93480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add IParsable<Uri> implementation to System.Uri #93479
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] logging improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser] refactor entropy #93466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix test build error when BuildAsStandalone is true #93457
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix crossgen2 invocation error under sourcebuild #93450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Miscellaneous cleanup #93446
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • (chore) set min version of cmake in native CmakeLists.txt to surpass Cmake CMP0000 policy warning #93437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use correct native type in test marshallers #93432
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Adjust System.Net metrics for OTel conformance and consistency #93414
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Update workload description to include target framework #93359
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Optimize Options Source Gen when no need to run #93481
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen with Length attributes applied on properties of Interface type #93482
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #92980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #92979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24
  • Attribute HttpListenerRequest.UserAgent as nullable #93405
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Switch StandaloneAppActivation to using pre-built test assets #93484
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Reduce differences between successor iterators #93445
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `BBF_TRY_BEG` #93367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] benchmark for appstart with memory snapshot #93477
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Options Source Gen when no need to run #93427
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix Options Source Gen with Length attributes applied on properties of Interface type #93426
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [docs] Howto configure the wasm runtime in Blazor projects in net8.0 #93475
    documentation, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Disable failing win-arm64 JIT tests #93451
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CompExactlyDependsOnAttribute on mono #93465
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Add ILLink substitution for wasm intrinsics #93407
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [QUIC] Fix test for debug/release version of a library #93449
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][tests] Make sure to log the exit code for library mode tests #93463
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix `TryLowerNegToMulLongOp` transformation with HW intrinsics disabled #93384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93198
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Resolve asset URL only once #93275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2290250 #93422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Explicitly represent BBJ_EHFINALLYRET successors #93377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve EH dead code elimination #93428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • wasm runtime tests debug #93365
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for binary and ternary TensorPrimitives operations #93409
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    needs-area-label
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime
  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat the compilation of 1 or more methods #93417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix analyzer treatment of flow captures of arrays #93420
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve logging on FirstDayOfWeek failures #93380
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix CMD_OBJECT_REF_GET_VALUES_BY_FIELD_TOKEN behavior #93363
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize unboxing in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use BigMul for 32x32=64 in decimal #93345
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V][WIP] Fixing createdump for RISC-V #93374
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip non virtual generic methods in build_imt_slots #93349
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Projects taking a FrameworkReference to ASP.NET do not get web-project targets settings #36122

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 installed, Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\dotnet\templates\8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41.nupkg(/content/BlazorWeb-CSharp/.template.config/localize/templatestrings.cs.json)".. displays during creating project. #35768
  • Way to make `dotnet run` as `Release` #36072
  • Building a test project with runtime results in either NETSDK1179 or NETSDK1031 #25118

PullRequests

Created

  • Test for hangs in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageInstall.Tests.dll #36119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra diag output #36115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #36094
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx

Merged

  • WorkloadCollection cleanup #36092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #36047
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #36073
    Area-External, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reduce test timeout to speed up timeouts. #36090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: New operator %% for canonical Modulus operations #7599

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add docs template for spec issues #7593
  • Clarify rules for diagnostic ID in `[Experimental]` attribute #7597
    Area-Compilers
  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interfaces not in autocompletion list after generic type #70382
    17.9
  • Stack overflow with large nested collection expression #70381
  • Integration tests that relate to decompilation/source-link/embedded-files have become flakey. #70376
  • Collection literals not emitted correctly in Roslyn #70375
    17.9
  • Intermittent MSB6006 compiler failures using CodeQL in GitHub Actions #70368

Closed

  • Collection expressions: Report warning when the compiler generates a heap allocation for a ref struct #69693
    17.9
  • Overload resolution prefers Span<T> over ReadOnlySpan<T> for collection expression #70318
    17.8
  • is operator with pattern matching not work as expertly #70379
  • Generic field access is improperly spilled in some scenarios #70339
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34213.14 #70369
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling StaticICULinking does not respect Cmake policy CMP0000 #70366

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions - error when we can't emit good codegen for ImmutableArray #70384
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Suggest interfaces after generic type name #70383
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Replace debug-only assertion with release check to fail fast #70380
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70378
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Repro #70374
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve performance of NameGenerator.EnsureUniqueness methods #70373
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Trying to fix integration tests #70371
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Multiple Inheritance Lookup Ambuguity.md #70367
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution #70328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not emit TypeDefinitionDocuments to EnC deltas. #70370
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flakey integration tests #70377
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rewrite captured field symbol during "materialization" #70344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #70347
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add support to the LSIF generator for document symbols #70304
    Area-IDE
  • Include project-id in sync'ed data to allow future calls to directly jump to that project. #70343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure rValue receiver is properly captured if there is an await in call arguments #70362
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Balzor AuthorizeView in latest .Net8.rc-2 Blazor-Web-App template not working reliably. #51368
  • Blazor .Net 8 RC2 Routing: LocationChanged not triggered #51366
  • Missing Blazor Web App Template in .NET 8 RC2 for arm64 #51365
  • In Razor Class Library (RCL) views that use "partial" tag helper won't render nested views when referenced from ASP.NET Razor Pages app #51364
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, plainTextSansFilter #51363
  • Quarantine ServerWithOldProtocolVersionClientWithNewProtocolVersionWorksDoesNotAllowStatefulReconnect #51361
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #51360
  • Blazor Auto RC2 is unresponsive in server mode #51356
  • Create an API Gateway/Proxy project template that uses YARP #51353
  • Creating a new Blazor Web App NET8 RC2 with WebAssembly Interactivity creates broken Error.razor page in Client project #51352
  • Using SupplyParameterFromQuery on arrays, Blazor Wasm triggers too many on OnParametersSet #51351
  • Blazor The trust relationship between the primary domain and the trusted domain failed with custom ServerAuthenticationStateProvider class. #51350
  • Streaming+Enhanced nav can be wrong if asynchrony is very brief #51345
    8.0.0
  • Component will be prerendered (executed) in server with InteractiveWebAssembly settings. #51342
  • Model for referencing a component from another component - declaratively #51340

Closed

  • Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.AspNetCore used deprecated NuGet packages #50569
  • NavigationManager.Uri does not update for interactive components on non-interactive routers #51216
    8.0.0
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload still reloads some files #42767
    Backlog
  • Suddenly "dotnet watch" runs in "Production" environment #44363
    .NET 9 Planning
  • dotnet watch and Blazor WebAssembly: client makes no attempt to connect to Hot Reload websocket server #47340
    .NET 9 Planning
  • dotnet 6 app stopped working after update to VS 2022 17.4 #44991
  • Adding Blazor WebAssembly project reference breaks Hot Reloading for Razor pages #48132
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Hot reload does not work and throws exceptions #48195
    .NET 9 Planning
  • dotnet watch not detecting changes to Razor Class Library #48835
    8.0.0
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext, updates #51284
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, plaintext #51301
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextSansFilter #51315
  • Perf regression: caching, connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #51343
  • NavLink not working in InteractiveServer #51297
    8.0.0
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #51344
  • [Blazor] It's not possible to use JavaScript for state management when using Static Render Mode. #51128

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine and retry failing tests #51362
    area-signalr
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [main] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51348
    area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix disabling anti-forgery check on route groups #51244
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix for URLs/querystrings not updating for interactive components when using SSR routing #51279
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [8.0] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    Servicing-approved, feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    Servicing-approved, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix streaming SSR timing issue #51333
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • [Fix-up] Track indicators of excessive stream resets #51306
    area-networking
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Blazor web template cleanup #51337
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How can I install dotnet tools on runtime only pod? #4140
    8.0.0

Updated

  • When initializing SOS, `coreclr_initialize` sometimes fails with HR `0x80131022`, leading to "Unrecognized command" error for managed commands #4315
    9.0.0
  • !clrstack reports incorrect method names when <> is encountered #4314

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional !maddress fixes #4325
    bug, sos
  • Add Meter Tags, Instrument Tags, and Scopes to System Diagnostics Metrics #4324
  • Fix log scope construction #4323

Merged

  • Initial Patch for RISC-V support. #4322

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • hot reload #18018
  • maui .net7.0 DisplayAlert button hide on android 8.1 ? #18017
  • Picker is empty on mac catalyst #18015
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI] CarouselView layout issues : Take 1, 2, 3, FOUR #18014
  • MAUI .net 7 ios push notifications not received in DidReceiveRemoteNotification #18012
  • RadioButton: TextColor for plain Content not working on iOS #18011
  • FlexLayout don't right manage Elementsize with Element margin #18010
  • [ImageButton][Android] Padding is incorrect after IsVisible is changed #18001
  • Entry field does not get unfocused when you click on another element in the view. This works in Xamarin #18000
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TimePicker does not support Format property for Android as documented #17999
  • iOS Border crops/masks underlying elements wrong with clearly abnormal visual effect (iOS only) - repro project included #17998
  • MAUI does not draw correct shadow for RoundRectangle Border when shape is set in Windows (simple repro project included) #17996
  • Can't build only one target in a multi target maui project #17994
  • New MAUI project template in .NET 8 is defining default svg files as AndroidResource #17993
  • BoxView on Android does not constrain its width to container #17992
  • Window.SizeChanged fired moving MainWindow #17991
    Backlog

Closed

  • vscode error while fetching extensions XHR failed #17962
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match new Blazor Web App conventions #16797
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] `ImageButton` causes app unresponsiveness #17868
  • [Windows] Content of `Grid` placed inside `ScrollView` is partially visible #17870
  • [Windows] `Grid` layout does not resize correctly #17869

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behaviour on TemporalAll GroupBy #32048
  • Best way to configure default schema retroactively (SQL Server) #32047
  • Is there any workaround for issue #26703 #32046
  • Migration for linq To sql with updateCheck #32045
  • Include ConnectionCreatingAsync & ConnectionCreatedAsync in IDbConnectionInterceptor #32042

Closed

  • JSON Column handling with unknown/dynamic structure #32043
  • EFCore 8 RC cannot map (dynamic / object) in complex type #32012
